/usr/bin/c++    -g3 -std=gnu++11 -O3 -funroll-loops -fno-strict-aliasing  -finline-functions  -fdebug-prefix-map=/home/kienpham/project/fpga_network/SimGrid-3.21=. -flto   -rdynamic CMakeFiles/task_destroy_cancel.dir/task_destroy_cancel/task_destroy_cancel.cpp.o  -o task_destroy_cancel/task_destroy_cancel  -Wl,-rpath,/home/kienpham/project/fpga_network/SimGrid-3.21/lib ../../lib/libsimgrid.so.3.21 -lm Boost::context -lpthread -lrt /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libdl.so -lgfortran   -Wl,--as-needed -latomic -Wl,--no-as-needed
